name: Jangjorim
instructions:
Boil beef in 2 liters water and skim residue. Simmer for 1.5 hours until beef can be shredded. Drain (reserve stock) and shred beef then return to pot with quartered onion, whole garlic, soy sauce, and sugar. Simmer 30-45 minutes until meat is very tender.

Hard boil eggs and add to finished meat. Refrigerate until eggs absorb some sauce.
